caption: Table 1: Hyperparameters
description: This table shows the hyperparameters used for each algorithm (OGA, APGA, GABP) in each game setting (Random Payoff with full/noisy feedback, Hard Concave-Convex with full/noisy feedback).  The hyperparameters include the learning rate (η), the update interval (Tσ), and the perturbation strength (μ).  These values were carefully tuned to ensure optimal performance in each experiment.
